import { Icon } from "@iconify/react"; import React from "react"; import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; // import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; const About = () => { return (
About me

Hello, I'm Shubham Chikhale, a recent graduate in BBA(CA) with a keen interest in Front-end Development and React. I have completed several online courses and have hands-on experience in creating web applications using React.

); }; export default About;
